languages.text: "Как прикажете, Ваша Светлость. Командиры выражают надежду, что вы будете готовы созвать совет в скором времени — без вашей поддержки флот не может начать нападение, а дорога каждая секунда".

traits.locale_text: "Как прикажете, Ваша Светлость. Командиры выражают надежду, что вы разберетесь с делами в скором времени — без вашей поддержки флот не может начать нападение, а дорога каждая секунда".

languages.text: "As you will, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."
languages.original_text: "Как прикажете, Ваша Светлость. Командиры выражают надежду, что вы будете готовы созвать совет в скором времени — без вашей поддержки флот не может начать нападение, а дорога каждая секунда".

traits.locale_text: "As you order, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Commanders express their hope that you will be ready to summon the council as soon as possible. Without your support the fleet cannot begin the attack, and every second counts."

"As you order, your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Commanders express their hope that you will be ready to summon the council as soon as possible. Without your support the fleet cannot begin the attack, and every second counts."

"As you order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."

"As you order, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."

"As you will, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."

languages.text: “遵命，大人。指挥官们希望您能尽快召开会议。若是没有您的支援，舰队无法发动进攻，每分每秒都非常重要。”
languages.original_text: "As you will, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，大人。指挥官们希望您能尽快召开会议。若是没有您的支援，舰队无法发动进攻，每分每秒都非常重要。”

languages.text: « À vos ordres, Votre Seigneurie. Les commandants espèrent que vous serez à même de convoquer un conseil dans les plus brefs délais. Sans votre soutien, la flotte ne peut pas entamer les manœuvres d'attaque. Chaque seconde compte. »
languages.original_text: "As you will, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."

traits.locale_text: « À vos ordres, Votre Seigneurie. Les commandants espèrent que vous serez à même de convoquer un conseil dans les plus brefs délais. Sans votre soutien, la flotte ne peut pas entamer les manœuvres d'attaque. Chaque seconde compte. »

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Kommandanten hoffen, dass Ihr so bald wie möglich einen Rat einberuft. Ohne Eure Unterstützung kann die Flotte nicht angreifen. Jede Sekunde zählt."
languages.original_text: "As you will, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Kommandanten hoffen, dass Ihr so bald wie möglich einen Rat einberuft. Ohne Eure Unterstützung kann die Flotte nicht angreifen. Jede Sekunde zählt."

"Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Kommandanten hoffen, dass Ihr so bald wie möglich einen Rat einberuft. Ohne Eure Unterstützung kann die Flotte nicht angreifen. Jede Sekunde zählt."

languages.text: «Como desee, {mf|milord|milady}. Los comandantes agradecerían que se celebrase un consejo lo antes posible. Sin su ayuda, la flota no puede iniciar el ataque. Cada segundo cuenta».
languages.original_text: "As you will, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee, {mf|milord|milady}. Los comandantes agradecerían que se celebrase un consejo lo antes posible. Sin su ayuda, la flota no puede iniciar el ataque. Cada segundo cuenta».

languages.text: 「ご意志のままに、陛下。司令たちは、陛下ができるだけ早く評議会を召集する準備が整っていることを願っております。陛下の支援なくしては、艦隊は攻撃を開始できません。一刻の猶予もありません」
languages.original_text: "As you will, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."

traits.locale_text: 「ご意志のままに、陛下。司令たちは、陛下ができるだけ早く評議会を召集する準備が整っていることを願っております。陛下の支援なくしては、艦隊は攻撃を開始できません。一刻の猶予もありません」

languages.text: "Başüstüne {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Komutanlar, bir an evvel konseyi kurmanızı umuyor. Sizin desteğiniz olmadan filo, taarruza başlayamaz. Şu raddede her lahzanın kıymeti var."
languages.original_text: "As you will, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The commanders hope that you will be ready to summon a council as soon as possible. Without your support, the fleet cannot begin the attack. Every second counts."
